title: Stuck at honour level 3 for some reason?
body: So I've been playing alot recently and have noticed alot of people commending me, however I'm still honour level 2, even though my friends have been honoured less than me but are honour level 3, I'm not too sure if my account is bugged or not, I would appreciate any help :>

replies.body: Not stuck, but there's no current visible meter so I know it can feel like a while.  Just keep at it, and you'll get it even if you don't gain a lot of honor.
